website_summaries.verdict: A solid vanity light fixture that provides plenty of light and excellent value.
pros: Attractive, mirror-like finish complements most bathrooms
Can be connected to additional fixtures for a variety of different configurations

website_summaries.verdict: A versatile product, but consumers must know beforehand what type of electrical wiring to have (corded or in-wall) for this 2-for-1 product, which can cause frustration.
pros: Once you figure out how to open the back panel, installation is easy
Option for two super-bright strips allows for different configurations atop or beside a bathroom or vanity mirror
cons: Wiring and harness must be purchased separately
Metal base can bend or warp if handled too firmly

customer_reviews.title: Girls best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I've ever made. I followed Simply Sandra's tutorial on YouTube and it came out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Vanity Mirror, Love it <3
customer_reviews.text: Looove them ! Exactly what I was looking for and it made my vanity complete <3
customer_reviews.author: Jezzy

customer_reviews.title: DIY Hollywood vanity mirror
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these for my DIY Hollywood vanity mirror...good quality, I love my new vanity.
customer_reviews.author: RENNIE S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for DIY Vanity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these fixtures for my DIY vanity project. They were exactly what I was looking for! No, they do not include light bulbs (what light fixture comes with bulbs??) and yes, they are designed to be hard wired, so you will need to do a little "electrical work". A simple google search will provide you with all the instructions that you need (contrary to another review, you do not need to be an electrical engineer).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Bad instructions (the key instruction is basically left out).
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. Easy to install. Throws plenty of light. The instructions don't say how to separate the back plate from the front, but here ya go: Twist and pull the chrome light socket casings off the front. The back will fall right off. Then just put them back on once the unit is hung.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: I used it to Build a Vanity for my Valentine
customer_reviews.text: Great! I used them to Build a Hollywood style Vanity for my Valentine
customer_reviews.author: Faazon

customer_reviews.title: Quality matches the price, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: The metal is thin and the construction is pretty flimsy but that is to be expected at this price point. I bought this to mount over my bench in my workshop to flood it with light and it works perfectly for my application. It added the perfect touch of class to the cobweb covered wood panel wall in my basement that will show my guests what a stylish modern handyman I am.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!!! Wayyy better than the one from Ikea! It's really thin and shiny which is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: naanaa13

customer_reviews.title: Mainstream hardware store has better for same $ and better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered wrong color. Broken. And it was poor quality. No instructions. No parts. Mainstream hardware store that starts with an L has an even better product for same price. It also had parts and instructions. Don't listen to 5* reviews. Save yourself a headache. You've been warned. And I'm romantic optimist by nature writing you this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Happy with how my DIY Vanity Set up turned out!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple & easy set up, required little to no instructions for me. It came with almost everything needed, minus some measuring tape & extension cords to wired them all together. Since I also purchased the same brand, but also 2 sets of the 4 lights for the sides of this. I absolutely love my new setup! I've received many compliments, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa CelestialHealings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used them to make a vanity at home for my daughter! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: courtney payne

customer_reviews.title: Lots of light for little price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product for the price if you need a quick and easy solution to an insufficiently lit bathroom. I wired this fixture externally using a lamp cord replacement and on/off receptacle switch from Home Depot. Works perfectly. I opted for 6-60w Type G25 bulbs and they provide an incredible amount of light. I did not find it necessary to use the 100w bulbs. This product came in great condition, perfectly packaged, and totally solved our problem of not being able to hardwire fixtures into the wall (because we live in an apartment complex).
customer_reviews.author: Big_N_Tasty

customer_reviews.title: Brass Vanity Light Strip
customer_reviews.text: Poor product, poor manufacturing, poor quality control, poor packaging and damaged frame/broken ceramic bulbs. We had an electrician here to install the light and were upset when the ceramic bulb frames were chipped and broken. However we installed the light only to discover that the brass frame was dented and the ends didn't meet properly, due to poor manufacturing. We tried to straighten it without success. The flaw happened to be on the end that was visable. It works. It's unfortunate but it's in and we can't send it back. Even the size was wrong, it's 2 1/2" wide, not 4 1/2" as listed. Most unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: The end result is good, be careful how you take it apart
customer_reviews.text: These lights need to come with a better instruction sheet. They tell you to take the assembly apart but they don't tell you how to accomplish that. They also don't tell you that the base rings below the bulbs must be pulled off by force. The first one I released had me so concerned I was going to damage the wiring that I ended up injuring both thumbs (ouch!) on the sharp spikes that retain the ring itself over the socket, and then bleeding all over the assembly not knowing I was leaking. It took a while but once installed it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysalisman

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend
customer_reviews.text: If i could give this zero stars... I would. This is the second time i have ordered this light thinking that maybe the first was maybe defective...The second arrived and only half of the lights turn on?? This is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: kaddiamy

customer_reviews.title: So poorly made you should only buy it if you want to burn your house down!!!
customer_reviews.text: this has the worst product design I have ever seen!!! It is so poorly made I wish I could give it less than 1 star. Cheap material, one step above aluminum foil. Not sure how it is legally allowed to be sold, The light sockets do not secure properly and it has eight lights with two sets of wiring that you must splice into one outlet??? Only buy it if you want to burn your house down!!! It is going BACK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lights.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights ! Did a DIY of a Hollywood makeup vanity and came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these. I installed one and it is so bright, you can't look directly at it. I'll probably tear it down and scrap it. First thing I checked was to see if it could be dimmed. Apparently you cannot dim it. I can't imagine getting up in the morning and having these in my eyes first thing. No thanks. Also, the individual cubes are not perfectly straight and horizontal. Very disappointed. I'm returning the second one unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Nhi Le

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was easily the hardest thing my husband and I have ever tried to install. It’s barely hanging there. You have to remove the plate that goes on the wall which is secured by the 6 lights and then once the plate is secured to the wall and you go to reattached the front with the lights there’s no way to get the prongs back in. So we removed the plate from the wall and tried to put it back together to no avail. We did the best we could and hung it like a picture frame. Would not recommend. I’m anticipating it will one day fall off the wall and I’ll just buy something better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Land

customer_reviews.title: POOR quality
customer_reviews.text: To get to the wires, you must separate the front from the mounting bracket. it is held on by a "c" clamp on the back of each light socket. When you release all the clamps you can access the wires but will now be unable to re-clamp the light sockets. This leaves the entire fixture with the sockets rolling around loosely on the front and give it a very cheap and horrible ascetic. DO NOT BUY from this brand
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Return didn't go well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these vanity mirrors for a DIY Makeup Mirror project. I decided to purchase a lighted vanity instead. I received the package but never opened it and returned as soon as I could. I was refunded partially but not for the entire purchase. I would not purchase again from this seller as the return resulted in them keeping moist of what I paid for an items I never opened.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love my lights
customer_reviews.text: I love my lights. To be honest I was very upset when I got it and was going to return them because when I pulled them out the box it looked blue when blue was not even a option but the more I played with them then I realized you are pose to pull the blue layer off to see the actual product lol. I ended up spray painting them gold anyway. Wiring them I learned off of youtube and it was pretty easy. So I give it 5 stars 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are written in very broken English. Otherwise it's good for the price. When the instructions tell you to separate the front plate from the back plate, you are supposed to remove the three cylinders on the front. This wasn't clear to me and instead I separated the things that the bulb actually screw into from the back plate with a screw driver, which was a huge waste of time. Otherwise it was an easy install, except that I had to provide my own drywall anchors
customer_reviews.author: David Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not as hard as it seems
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving the light fixture it was everything i expected it to be. I did my research and knew that it had to be hardwired meaning that their is no plug attachment and you have to do it your self. I saw alot of people complaing about how hard it was but after watching a youtube tutorial it seemed fairly easy to do. Fortunately as well my boyfriend is an electrician. When reaseaching I also saw a few complaints about the chrome lights being blue and when i opened mine it was indeed blue too but it's just simply a cover that can be peeled off to reveal the chrome which was so easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: My electrician installed this and it seemed to be fine. When finished only three lights would light. He said it wasn’t the wires. ???? I may be too late to return this....if the company can let me know, I would appreciate it. Otherwise it’s really pretty and gives off lots of lite...even with only three working.
customer_reviews.author: GRR

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I bought it for my vanity and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought it for my vanity and it's honestly worth buying these light strips and a mirror instead of buying a Hollywood vanity mirror that would cost you around $250-650. I recommend these light strips to anyone trying to built a vanity on their own. Electricity work is extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: ebelin javier

customer_reviews.title: Great fixtures!
customer_reviews.text: I love the light fixtures they arrived in great condition and really quickly. I saw a few reviews where customers thought they were the wrong color ( they come with a protective film which is blue). They were easy to assemble. To get to the wiring you must first remove the cuffs that go over the fixtures and the covering plate lifts easily. Do Not Unclip The Fixtures From The Back Plate. As some people have stated they have, I imaging if you do this to gain access to the wires you will have a hard time putting the fixture back together. I would recommend these fixtures and would definitely purchase them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product a little damaged
customer_reviews.text: Products worked great and had decent build quality. In each vanity though ( I bought 3 total) at least one of the I assume ceramic light fixture had broken pieces. It didn’t affect the use of the product and it can’t been see. Once the panel is placed over it however this could have been a storage or Shipment problem as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Made a hollywood-style mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This was a DIY project. I bought 2 packs of 5- bulb light and 1pack of 8- bulb light plus a mirror(30" by 40" from Lowes), and that was so easy to set up! I made a Hollywood style mirror with lights and saved a few hundreds of dollars! Looks amazing! Very recommended to anyone who would like to dive into​ DIY projects!
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Tsukanov

customer_reviews.title: Another Piece of Junk Sold by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Another piece of crap sold by Amazon. I have been wrestling with this piece of junk for hours. The holes do not match up with the mounting bracket. The screws are stripped. Do not buy this go to Home Depot where you can take it back and get the correct mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not happy for the $$ paid
customer_reviews.text: Arrived badly banged up.. I had to straighten the metal casings on all three items ordered at multiple points (2x6 and 1x8 light fixtures). Porcelain bulb contacts were all broken thankfully not exposing any wires and they actually seem usable. I am not sure if they work because I haven’t tested any item yet. I wish their condition wasn’t that bad for the money paid. Definitely not “very good” or “excellent” quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni Choco

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We installed them on the side of my vanity with hinges and they do work but for the price they could've been much better quality. They were packaged in two boxes and the outside box wasn't damaged at all but the inside one was so it was probably damaged before shipping. Some places the white paint was scratched off and almost all the bulb holders were loose and warped and had to be taken out and made to fit better.
customer_reviews.author: laynkotasmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: One of our bathrooms relies heavily on the over-mirror light for room lighting. We needed something that could illuminate a larger area and also throw enough light over the sink for grooming/makeup etc. This 8 light fixture did the trick. It's very basic in appearance but highly functional. With standard light bulb bases, it was simple to find the LED bulbs we needed. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T.

customer_reviews.title: While priced on the lower end of similar items it looks great and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have found these and I enjoy the modern look and styling. They came well protected by the vinyl film and my only complaint is the adhesive backed tag on one of the light base covers on each fixture. It removed easily enough but the adhesive took a lot of rubbing alcohol to remove.
customer_reviews.author: graceman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for the makeup vanity I made. This is exactly what I was looking for. Except a screw in the base of the bulb that screws into the bracket was missing. All the others were dine except for that one bulb base so my husband went scrummaging to find a screw to fit. Other than that, easy installation for the intended purpose. Please read the description!! It has a blue plastic film that protects the chrome... you have to peel off. Yes, this takes some installation. Nothing crazy. And, yrs, you can use these bathroom lights for your makeup vanity. Just get the correct bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Rosana

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old rusty light fixture with this. Our bathroom looks 100 times better. This was such a simple project that made our bathroom look so much better. The price is great and the product looks high quality. The only side note I have is we had some trouble installing it but we watched a YouTube video to see what we were doing wrong and we're able to finish this project quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace one that looked and measured very close to this. It fit (with some minor adjustment), and though I didnt have instructions, its very self explainatory. Looks awesome. Lights up that bathroom nicely. Fantastic price too.
customer_reviews.author: renoboyd

customer_reviews.title: These are stupid.
customer_reviews.text: You would think since the picture is white, you would receive the strips in white, but no they came in metallic blue with a giant sticker in the dead center of them that when you peel it off it makes not one, but several giant scratch marks. Also there’s no on/off switch like you would hope. And also no instructions. I watched an hour long YouTube video and 100 bucks at Home Depot later and hours of work and I finally got them up. Just for them to fall down several times and oh, can’t forget the fact that the lights shake and make you feel like your seizing.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price and takes even the cheap light bulbs has a Really pretty glow not blinding.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light fixture like this to replace an old one in my guest bathroom. I found it on Amazon. It was a little bit shorter than the old one, but that turned out great since it is the exact width of my mirror. The holes to mount it to the wall was in different locations, so I had to use the wall anchors included with the fixture. I am well pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Really nice vanity for someone who wants to be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice vanity for someone who wants to be a bit more hands on. You have to wire it yourself and purchase bulbs. It looks great once you put it together,clean and expensive looking. Unless you tell someone they wouldn't know it's something you did yourself. You have to Be careful the edges are really sharp!! I used command strips to hang mine.(the picture hanging strips large)
customer_reviews.author: Petranalla

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Vanity
customer_reviews.text: i purchase this to make my own makeup vanity for my studio and it looks so beautiful. I get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Luv

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect Over Bathroom Vanity
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old light over my bathroom vanity that has been burned out for quite a while with this Nuvo vanity strip. What I like most about it is that I used a dimmer switch with LED bulbs, and when I turn it up to max I can really see. Getting older and eyes aren't what they used to be. Also price was cheap, didn't want to spend a lot being as I'm about to sell the house.
customer_reviews.author: Airbus30B

customer_reviews.title: Good vanity lights
customer_reviews.text: Good vanity lights. Super easy to assemble and came with the cord nuts. I used it as a vanity too. I dont wear makeup, but I did need a desk and this was a great way to add cozy lights and a little glam to my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is used in the bathroom above the vanity. Bright lights and easy to install. This is the 2nd light we received. The first item was dented in very visible places. Sent back to company asking for a replacement and the new light wasn't scheduled to arrive for a month later. I canceled the replacement, got a refund and reordered the same light. I received it in 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: christine greco-klauba

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Inspection
customer_reviews.text: The product is cheaply constructed. The electrical sockets are snap-ons. For these reasons, they easily pop out. . The biggest problem is the quality inspection. Both ends were bent and dented. Yet, they were sold and shipped. Fortunately, the problems were not noticeable, when the device is viewed head-on.
customer_reviews.author: Gene P. Louie

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a high quality light fixture and at first glance appears pretty cheaply made, but it's perfectly acceptable considering the $20 price tag. My mother in law was looking for a basic and affordable light to replace the old nasty one in her bathroom. This one fit the bill perfectly. It was simple to install and actually looks quite nice once it's up.
customer_reviews.author: Madhatter

customer_reviews.title: nice looking light setup
customer_reviews.text: i really like how these look. they work really well. I just wish there was an option with the wiring to just plug it into an outlet. i had to buy an outlet plug/wire to splice onto the light fixture and then hooked that up to a toggle switch.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Not bad looking, and cheap, but incredibly difficult to mount because the back-plate sits directly against the wall, so you have to try really strange maneuvering to actually get it to lock in place. Because the edges are sharp, make sure to wear gloves, otherwise you'll end up cutting yourself. Save your wallet and fingers and get something that's higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The screws that hold the lights in place were screwed in after closing the case, so all had to be removed for installation instead of just the one that should have opened the case. Screws holding lights were also too small so nuts were used in back of them, and the promptly fell out after removal of screws. Garbage light unless you're much more patient then me!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Will it work
customer_reviews.text: Got the lights, put them up, and the wiring to 3 lights was faulty. I fixed the issue, as I have a good working knowledge of wiring. Kinda disappointed but now days many things built overseas are cheaply built.
customer_reviews.author: Tim  Parker

customer_reviews.title: Idiots and their dumb reviews and ratings
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the one stars because they all have the same theme--none knew how to install it and if something arrives broken due to shipping it has nothing to do with the item itself. And reviews and ratings are different things. If any one needs to know how to install still, just ask me. It is a simple and inexpensive fixtures, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Justask

customer_reviews.title: Dented, bulbs and cord not included.
customer_reviews.text: It looks cheap but not too bad, the only thing that I worry is that I wanted to put this in my bathroom, which would absolutely RUST with the vapor. It did come dented but it seems like you can kind of straighten out, but it should be in great shape and they need to put put a fragile sign. It did come open so I thought the cord fell out or something , but this does not come with a cord or the bulbs, just the silver frame. Too many extra pieces you have to buy, still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked, hard to find color.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find lights in this color now a days. Not really the style. But my grandmother had two in her bathroom that were in dyer need of replacement. To avoid painting the walls etc... I opted to track down these lights to match the footprint. Did the job.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beware - dinged vanity light strip for bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: The box holding the light was crumpled even through it was send in a bigger package by Amazon that was not dinged (see photo of package). That means that the person packing the light for shipment didn't inspect the package before putting it in the shipping carton. The fixture also had a small ding that was similar to the crumple on the box. I was stuck with the fixture because I had an electrician over so we straightened the ding as best we could and put the ding on top of the fixture. This should not happen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Easy to install, everything worked. Very shiny chrome; like a mirror finish. The only flaw was a couple of small pin holes drilled in the face of the cover that I didn't notice until after it was installed....oh well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product was cheap looking as is the price. Would have not been easy to install. I had a six bulb before they are hard to find. So I went to local hardware store bought 2 four bulbs and put them together. I would not recommend product my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Debbe

customer_reviews.title: An alternate use.
customer_reviews.text: Spliced a 6' dimmer cord to it to make it a corded lamp and secured it to the wall above a 36" frameless beveled edge mirror to make a Hollywood style vanity mirror for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheap lighting option
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my vanity lighting. Many people are complaining about needing to wire them to be plugged in but come on people, vanity lighting is always hardwired. I added plugs for my bedroom and love them! Don't forget to remove the blue protective film! Also lighting fixtures never come with bulbs so don't complain about that either.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Kate

customer_reviews.title: These are just like the old ones in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: These are just like the old ones in our bathroom. My husband suggested we buy the same ones as what the builder put in, but better. These fit the hardware of the old ones. We only had to take the light portion down and rewire the new ones. This was perfect for us because they were installed in our mirror!
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN M.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this junk. Bent in half in shipping due to insufficient packing. Fixture looks very cheaply made but then you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: wanduerman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light strip to put around my vanity. It is hardwired but a quick youtube video showed me how to convert. It literally took less than 5 minutes to convert it to a plugin. It looks really nice. Shipping was fast and it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Easy to install. However, there were not instructions on how to remove the faceplate from the light fixture. HINT - remove the ceramic light holders from the front (they just pull off) and then the faceplate is easily removed for easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: EPB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best thing I’ve ever bought for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it I can actually see I got really bright light bulbs my husband don’t like all the light but the wife gets what she wants I have hair and makeup to put on I have to see he don’t he’s not in there long so he can just 🤫
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Wilson Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe garbage...see review.
customer_reviews.text: Misleading product page... Garbage....you’d really need an electrician to wire and mount these if you wanted to be sure it was safe. If you rent ( like me) definitely don’t bother! I regret this and missed my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Lilium Deaurabis

customer_reviews.title: One socket burns out new bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Need another one sent to us. This one has burned out 3 new lightbulbs in one of the sockets! Box was thrown away because we thought t was fine. About 36” long....now hiw would we return it without bix?
customer_reviews.author: Patti S

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended to buy very cheap
customer_reviews.text: The unit came broken had to have my Electrician fix the connection where the light bulb goes in before installation . Not Recommended To buy very cheap set Up. No quality at all. Very disappointed with product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I believe we put it in upside down because my dad refused to look at the directions to check, but he did it all for me so I cannot complain. It is not noticeable at all
customer_reviews.author: Josie_g04

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights , My boyfriend made a vanity mirror for me and I'm sooooo in love. Only down side was the small scratches underneath the paper protecting it but it doesn't bother me as much because I'll be doing my makeup not staring at a scratch. Great for the price , good buy !
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad bad
customer_reviews.text: Terrible do not buy- we couldn't even use them they were all bent up would have returned them but had past the time to do so by the time I opened them - I had ordered them long before our bathroom remodel and ended up having to buy more locally - I wish I had taken a pic before we chunked them!
customer_reviews.author: E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I installed them in my bathroom over the mirror. It's a little bit of work to mount them & get the wiring hooked up, but anybody can do it. I bought the exposed wire extension cord with a built in switch that most people buy with these, and used a YouTube video for instructions. Now I can see my face better when I shave. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Burns

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old light above mirror and it looks great. It was a perfect fit and size. Only thing was the light I took down had outlet on it this one doesn't but was able to add one next to it. Very pleased with how it looks
customer_reviews.author: Grandma W

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it would be easily damaged during shipping and handling
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived, installed it although it had a small dent in the underside of the cover. When it was turned on only 4 of the sockets worked. Upon closer inspection the rightmost four of the ceramic sockets were cracked/chipped and those four did not work. Low cost but cheaply made. Seems like it would be easily damaged during shipping and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be hard wired!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! I used both lights for a DIY vanity and loved the result! Super cheaper than buying a real Vanity mirror. Paid 25$ for frameless mirror at my local Home Depot & added these lights to each side of the mirror. I then proceeded to buy daylight light bulbs for the bar lights. The only thing I disliked is that fact that I had to hardwire them onto a extension cord so I could be able to plug them onto the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of these to replace identical fixtures in some rental houses that we own. They look great and were an exact match for the old ones that were already there.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne V

customer_reviews.title: Carefully remove each light socket shroud by twisting & pulling.
customer_reviews.text: Once you realize you need to carefully pull each light shroud off to remove the chrome cover. It's easy. Wasn't mentioned in my instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wood

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these for bathroom renovation. They ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for bathroom renovation. They both have visible dent on them at the corner. I returned them both. The frame is quite thin and look really cheap. Do not be lured by the price, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not clear
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great after you figure it out, but honestly there are no clear instructions on how to properly install it. I had to go to other people's review to find out how to do it. Instructions should be more clear and precise. Let me just say that you take it apart from the front of the panel and not the back. Very frustrating to install when that essential step is not included with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exact fit
customer_reviews.text: This fixture replaced a defective older one. The mounting holes lined up perfectly making this installation very quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dunstan

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy the 6-light bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bar with 6 lights, when it arrived only half of the lights worked. We rewired a couple of times thinking we might be wrong. Eventually we ended up returning it for another one. When that one came, it was the same problem- only 3 lights worked. I should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Castro

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install after watching a YouTube video
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install after watching a YouTube video. I suggest getting LED bulbs because regular bulbs get really hot, and melts lipsticks nearby and raises the room temperature. Personally I think 4000k color temperature LED bulbs are perfect for checking correct colors of makeup. Love this
customer_reviews.author: PandaMania

customer_reviews.title: Good fixture at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great light fixture and a good price. However, do not rely on the instructions that come with the fixture as they are fairly sparse. But it was easy to see that you had to remove the decorative cups from the light sockets to be able to separate the two pieces for instillation. It is simply a step that was left out of the instructions that come with the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: Not like new
customer_reviews.text: It was okay A little bent but not too bad still was able to use it The bag with the screws was already open. I didn’t need them because I was just using the outside the cover an old one just like it
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! I ordered these to set up in my makeup room. They are exactly what I needed and look so beautiful! The price is so affordable and I would recommend these 100%. I really done my homework on the best light strips for me and finally chose this one. I'm so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my new vanity lights for my studio salon! I am recommending this to a bunch of stylist friends because the length is perfect for our mirrors and most of us are stuck with horrible flourescent lights. If you use LED bulbs it doesn’t get hot and heat up. We used Velcro to attach it to the mirror so it doesn’t have any damage
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mohammadi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Well packed, easy install for a basic “shinny” light bar. We thought it was a good value. It has performed as expected.
customer_reviews.author: A Guy & A Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is the second light strip I've bought from Amazon and it was extremely easy to install and has worked beautifully. I was able to put it up all by myself in about 10 minutes and I'm not exactly handy. It came with protective coating so it wasn't damaged during shipping and the directions were very straightforward. It looks more expensive than it was for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alison_says

customer_reviews.title: Works great, measurements are slightly off.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than what Home Depot could offer. Used when building a vanity for my teen. Dimensions are slightly different online, on the box, and in actuality. Made it difficult and I am glad we did actual measurements before building. If measurements were corrected I’d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Old lady going back to school

customer_reviews.title: Gives off great light for a GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and gives off great light. It blends in so simply in the bathroom that I hardly notice it. Which, is nice because I'd rather notice the amazing tile work...plus looking directly into a light would hurt my eyes! haha
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but i would love to know if i ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, but i would love to know if i could use 240v led bulbs on it that are e26 screw mount. the ballast says 250v 600w, so i assume it would be safe to use australian bought 6w LEDs? i will be using a 3 lots of the 24 inch 4 bulb set ups linked together totalling 72w over the 3 connected vanitys bars. i would like to buy in bulk for commercial purposes but need this question answered, please feel free to email me at lujiez@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.author: C S LUKJANOWSKI

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Loving this vanity strip it worked perfectly with my makeup mirror I made... it is of great quality and looks very professional.. ( like Hollywood’s makeup stations) it is definitely worth the price... would purchase again ... beautiful...😘😘😘😘
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: * * How to remove back plate for install * *
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions are limited so offering this helpful tip: to separate the back plate for installation you must first remove the individual metal socket covers from the front (they fit snug so a little wiggling will be needed).
customer_reviews.author: MplsCityGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking lighting fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking lighting fixture! I installed this in the bathroom, and I'm really pleased with it, I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to upgrade their bathroom, or vanity. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sharpshooter01

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is good. One of my bars does have a dent in it. I tried to see if customer service would at least try to give me a discount on the product because of It, they did not they wanted me to send the set back for a refund. Needed the product did not have time to send back. I’m not satisfied with that but other than that the product is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money. You cant get to the Wires!
customer_reviews.text: Wires are twisted inside and back cannot be removed without breaking cheap metal tabs. Metal tabs are bent up and down to hold the socket to the back panel.
customer_reviews.author: Doug G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price. Had to change from the recommended bulbs because this is wall-mounted above a bathroom mirror, and I was being blinded by the light, and the heat from the decorative bulbs was too much. Ended up with 40 watt equivalent LED bulbs which work great.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Vanity Light Strip
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vanity light strip to replace an identical fixture that after 26 years of use was starting to show its age. While the mounting was not identical, a bit of Yankee ingenuity helped to get the unit fastened in place,
customer_reviews.author: Yitzak

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quickly and was pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make a vanity mirror! Delivered quickly and was pretty easy to assemble. I had to buy extension cords and wire myself. A YouTube video tutorial showed me how to connect the extension cords. If you have no desire to complete wiring you shouldn't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Meech

customer_reviews.title: It bent super easy when i took it apart for installation
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a quick fix for some rusted vanities until i find a pair of higher quality vanities. Be vary careful when handling the chrome outer part. It bent super easy when i took it apart for installation. I was able to bend it back but you can still see where it was bent. Overall good for a cheap replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my lights. They make such a big difference appearance wise at my makeup vanity area.. will definitely purchase again if I want to build another vanity area.
customer_reviews.author: The Linders

product_meta.title: NUVO SF77/194 Six Light Strip Vanity, 36-Inches, Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:Chrome| Size:36-InchesNuvo Lighting is uniquely, poised to become one of the industry’s leaders. With the sales and distribution resources of Satco products and the continued offering of finely conceived, well crafted products that deliver style, value and quality – Nuvo is a name that will become synonymous with lighting.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES- (1) Polished Chrome 6-Light Bathroom Vanity Light Bar (36-Inches x 4.75-Inches); bulbs not included
EASY INSTALLATION- The vanity bar strip features easy installation instructions and hardware for all DIY'ers out there (requires 100-Watt Type G incandescent bulbs)
STYLISH-The 6-Light traditional vanity design is simple yet elegant, transforming any bathroom with a burst of light
ON-TREND DESIGN: This Six Light Vanity Strip from the Signature collection by Nuvo will enhance your home with a perfect mix of elegance, simplicity, and function

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,622 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
